2x2

Master EG-1 Algorithms



This is the second and the last step in 2-Look/1-Look solving method where the bottom layer has an adjbcent swap of corners. Hold the 2 solved pieces at the back.

Beginner Algorithms: OLL, PLL, Ortega PBL.

Full LL: CLL, EG-1, EG-2.
